mapper.sql: sid sid,sale_code_sid saleCodeSid,pro_sku proSku,off_min offMin,off_max offMax,price_min priceMin,price_max priceMax,pro_begin_time proBeginTime,pro_end_time proEndTime,brand_sid brandSid,product_class_sid productClassSid,page_layout_sid pageLayoutSid,pro_stock_num proStockNum
mapper.select: select from PRO_CON_SEARCH pcs where pcs.sid=#{sid}
mapper.update:
update PRO_CON_SEARCH pcs
pcs.sale_code_sid = #{saleCodeSid},
pcs.pro_sku = #{proSku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcs.off_min = #{offMin} ,
pcs.off_max = #{offMax},
pcs.price_min = #{priceMin},
pcs.price_max = #{priceMax},
pcs.pro_begin_time = #{proBeginTime},
pcs.pro_end_time = #{proEndTime},
pcs.brand_sid = #{brandSid},
pcs.product_class_sid = #{productClassSid},
pcs.page_layout_sid = #{pageLayoutSid},
pcs.pro_stock_num = #{proStockNum}
where pcs.sid = #{sid}

update PRO_CON_SEARCH pcs
pcs.sale_code_sid = #{saleCode},
pcs.pro_sku = #{proSku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcs.off_min = #{offMin} ,
pcs.off_max = #{offMax},
pcs.price_min = #{priceMin},
pcs.price_max = #{priceMax},
pcs.pro_begin_time = #{proBeginTime},
pcs.pro_end_time = #{proEndTime},
pcs.brand_sid = #{brandSid},
pcs.product_class_sid = #{productClassSid},
pcs.page_layout_sid = #{pageLayoutSid},
pcs.pro_stock_num = #{proStockNum}
where pcs.page_layout_sid = #{pageLayoutSid}
